name: Pokemon Battle (Lando)
description:
⚠ WARNING: This is not a game. It's just a thing I made for learning purposes.

The main character has the stats of a Charmander, and there you'll find characters with stats of a Pikachu, a Bulbasaur, a Nidoran and a Squirtle.

The battle mechanic is exactly the same as the original Pokémon Red/Blue.

Sadly, this is a really old project and I lost the source code, but at that time I was proud of the result and decided to put it in here.
